title: MagicISO v5.5 Build 259 + Portable
description:
MagicISO 5.5 Build 259 plus Portable Versions.

No need to install it!

Although the www.magiciso.com is still referring it as v5.4 Build 0256, if you click on the Download links it delivers you the new version. Just D/L it by yourself at http://www.magiciso.com/download.htm...


The Package contains the Setup, the Patch, a first version of the program made portable w/ the batch file that launches the program converted to an EXE with QBFC to avoid showing the relative DOS window, but that some AVs see sometimes as a virus. If your AV is one of them, or if you don&#039;t trust too much to it, use the second one that runs directly the batch file. You will have the sloppy DOS window in the background but less complaints from antiviruses...


Enjoy and remember to seed... :o)
